actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.
Reported to House from the Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing with amendment, H. Rept. 94-183.
Measure called up by special rule in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #194 (291-104).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Home Loan Bank Board from permitting Federal savings and loan associations to offer loans secured by one to four homes or dwellings with variable interest rates.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #194 (291-104)) Prohibits the Federal Home Loan Bank Board under the Home Owners' Loan Act from authorizing by rule, regulation, or otherwise, a Federal association from offering loans secured by one to four homes or dwelling units with variable interest rates, unless the Congress so authorizes by law.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Home Loan Bank Board from permitting Federal savings and loan associations to offer loans secured by one to four homes or dwellings with variable interest rates.
